ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT f.id, category_id, f.`name`, f.small_title, `img`, `price`, `cost`, `sale_price`, `apply_subs`, `remark`, on_shelves, `state`, /*`description`,*/ f.`create_time`, f.`update_time` FROM `gs_item` f INNER JOIN gs_category c ON f.category_id = c.id WHERE c.merchant_id={merchant_id} AND ({state}=-100 OR state={state}) AND ({cid}=0 OR f.category_id={cid}) AND ('{keyword}'='' OR f.name Like '%{keyword}%') /*AND ('{cost1}'='' OR cost */ ORDER BY f.create_time DESC LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
